mapper.select: select Id budgetItemData_id, AreaCode budgetItemData_areaCode, EduGoalId budgetItemData_eduGoalId, GrowStagesId budgetItemData_growStagesId, EduModeId budgetItemData_eduModeId, CategoryId budgetItemData_categoryId, ItemId budgetItemData_itemId, IsInland budgetItemData_isInland, LowAmountTotal budgetItemData_lowAmountTotal, HighAmountTotal budgetItemData_highAmountTotal, LowAmount budgetItemData_lowAmount, HighAmount budgetItemData_highAmount, MaxAmount budgetItemData_maxAmount, SystemYearCount budgetItemData_systemYearCount, YearCount budgetItemData_yearCount, MaxYearCount budgetItemData_maxYearCount, Years budgetItemData_years, EndYears budgetItemData_endYears, PaymentGrade budgetItemData_paymentGrade, IsGrading budgetItemData_isGrading, GradingType budgetItemData_gradingType, PaymentMethod budgetItemData_paymentMethod, PaymentMonth budgetItemData_paymentMonth, IsInflation budgetItemData_isInflation, IsAreaTranslation budgetItemData_isAreaTranslation, Comment budgetItemData_comment, DataSources budgetItemData_dataSources, TrainingAgencyName budgetItemData_trainingAgencyName, CreateDate budgetItemData_createDate, UpdateDate budgetItemData_updateDate, CreatorId budgetItemData_creatorId from EB_BudgetItemData

select Id budgetItemData_id, AreaCode budgetItemData_areaCode, EduGoalId budgetItemData_eduGoalId, GrowStagesId budgetItemData_growStagesId, EduModeId budgetItemData_eduModeId, CategoryId budgetItemData_categoryId, ItemId budgetItemData_itemId, IsInland budgetItemData_isInland, LowAmountTotal budgetItemData_lowAmountTotal, HighAmountTotal budgetItemData_highAmountTotal, LowAmount budgetItemData_lowAmount, HighAmount budgetItemData_highAmount, MaxAmount budgetItemData_maxAmount, SystemYearCount budgetItemData_systemYearCount, YearCount budgetItemData_yearCount, MaxYearCount budgetItemData_maxYearCount, Years budgetItemData_years, EndYears budgetItemData_endYears, PaymentGrade budgetItemData_paymentGrade, IsGrading budgetItemData_isGrading, GradingType budgetItemData_gradingType, PaymentMethod budgetItemData_paymentMethod, PaymentMonth budgetItemData_paymentMonth, IsInflation budgetItemData_isInflation, IsAreaTranslation budgetItemData_isAreaTranslation, Comment budgetItemData_comment, DataSources budgetItemData_dataSources, TrainingAgencyName budgetItemData_trainingAgencyName, CreateDate budgetItemData_createDate, UpdateDate budgetItemData_updateDate, CreatorId budgetItemData_creatorId from EB_BudgetItemData where Id=${id}

select Id budgetItemData_id, AreaCode budgetItemData_areaCode, EduGoalId budgetItemData_eduGoalId, GrowStagesId budgetItemData_growStagesId, EduModeId budgetItemData_eduModeId, CategoryId budgetItemData_categoryId, ItemId budgetItemData_itemId, IsInland budgetItemData_isInland, LowAmountTotal budgetItemData_lowAmountTotal, HighAmountTotal budgetItemData_highAmountTotal, LowAmount budgetItemData_lowAmount, HighAmount budgetItemData_highAmount, MaxAmount budgetItemData_maxAmount, SystemYearCount budgetItemData_systemYearCount, YearCount budgetItemData_yearCount, MaxYearCount budgetItemData_maxYearCount, Years budgetItemData_years, EndYears budgetItemData_endYears, PaymentGrade budgetItemData_paymentGrade, IsGrading budgetItemData_isGrading, GradingType budgetItemData_gradingType, PaymentMethod budgetItemData_paymentMethod, PaymentMonth budgetItemData_paymentMonth, IsInflation budgetItemData_isInflation, IsAreaTranslation budgetItemData_isAreaTranslation, Comment budgetItemData_comment, DataSources budgetItemData_dataSources, TrainingAgencyName budgetItemData_trainingAgencyName, CreateDate budgetItemData_createDate, UpdateDate budgetItemData_updateDate, CreatorId budgetItemData_creatorId from EB_BudgetItemData order by Id asc limit ${start},${offset}
